General.Name: Changchun Engley Automobile Industry Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Changchun Engley Automobile Industry Co.,Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells automobile parts and tooling. Its products include bumper flames, sill, upper and lower shell battery packs, sun-frame assemblies, hot-formed A-pillar assemblies, underbody cover plates, spare tire compartment, door panels, wheel arch, bodywork sidewalls, front walls, and other related products. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Changchun, China.
